item.description:
From Candidate Jon Searles:

I need your help on Saturday, Oct. 3rd.

I and my fellow Tea Party candidates Susan Kniep and Eileen Powers will be hitting the streets in force on Saturday, Oct. 3rd and we want you there with us! Perhaps it's the feeling of working for something you believe in or perhaps it's victory looming just a few short weeks away, but I can't wait.

We will meet at 9AM in the Putnam Plaza parking lot in front of AT&T Cellular. 1 Main Street, East Hartford, CT.

Walking lists, materials and driving directions will be provided as well as pizza at the end of the day (If your feet last that long!).

Please RSVP to jon@ehtea.com or (860) 930-4149.

An event to help a fellow patriot running for office.

barbara g.
item.name: Activists: Door-to-Door Saturday, Oct. 3rd
